<h1 align="center">
  The Pint & Pony - website
</h1>
<h3>Commands ðŸš€</h3>
<ul>
<li>Gatsby Develop on localhost port 8000  _`gatsby develop`_</li>
<li>Gatsby Develop from Local LAN:  _`gatsby develop -H 0.0.0.0`_</li>
</ul>
<ul>
<li>Build site _`gatsby build`_</li>
<li>Serve built site on localhost port 9000  _`gatsby serve`_</li>
<ul>
</ul>
<li>If hosting on a sub-domain build using: _`gatsby build --prefix-paths`_</li>
<li>Serve built site on localhost port 9000 with sub-domain: _`gatsby serve --prefix-paths`_</li>
<li>If some images or links are broken clean the cache: _`gatsby clean`_</li>
</ul>
